title: Remove Institutional Course

requirements.text: Remove the 'institution' course from the predefined courses list in the backend main actor

quotes: Institutional course ko remove kar do

acceptanceCriteria: The 'institution' course is no longer present in the backend courses map
The course cannot be enrolled in or displayed anywhere in the application

requirements.text: Update the migration module to remove the 'institution' course from the courses map

quotes: Institutional course ko remove kar do

acceptanceCriteria: The migration.mo file no longer includes the 'institution' course in its course definitions

requirements.text: Remove the 'institution' course image mapping from the courseImages utility function

quotes: Institutional course ko remove kar do

acceptanceCriteria: The courseImages.ts utility no longer includes a mapping for the 'institution' course ID

requirements.text: Verify that the institutional course no longer appears in any course listings on the public homepage, student dashboard, or management views

quotes: Institutional course ko remove kar do

acceptanceCriteria: The institutional course does not appear in the available courses list
The institutional course does not appear in enrolled courses
The institutional course is not available for selection in the student application form

constraints: Preserve all other existing courses (basic, advanced, super, meditation)
Do not modify the course data structure or enrollment logic
Maintain backward compatibility for existing student enrollments in other courses
